mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER (ID, PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID, DELIVERY_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, ORDER_ADDRESS, PRODUCT_COUNT) VALUES (SEQ_ORDER.NEXTVAL, #{productId}, #{memberId}, #{deliveryId}, #{ordernumber}, #{orderAddress}, #{productCount})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID, DELIVERY_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, ORDER_DATE, PRODUCT_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE, DELIVERY_STATUS FROM VIEW_ORDER

SELECT TBO.ID, TBO.PRODUCT_ID, TBO.MEMBER_ID, TBO.DELIVERY_ID, TBO.ORDER_NUMBER, TBO.ORDER_DATE, TBO.ORDER_ADDRESS, TBO.PRODUCT_COUNT, TBP.PRODUCT_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_EMAIL FROM TBL_ORDER TBO JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TBP ON TBO.PRODUCT_ID = TBP.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBO.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID WHERE TBO.ID = #{id}
